title: Terms and Conditions
terms_accept_description: By accessing and using the Three Lizards website, you agree to and accept the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our website.
terms_modifications_description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and continued use of our website after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the new Terms. We recommend checking this page regularly.
intellectual_property_description: All content, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio, video clips, and software, is the property of Three Lizards or its content providers and is protected by intellectual property laws. Reproduction, distribution, or modification of this content without our express written permission is not permitted.
